Installation¶

The quickest way¶

xrft is compatible both with Python 2 and 3. The major dependencies are xarray and dask. The best way to install them is using Anaconda.:

$ conda install xarray dask .

Install xrft from GitHub repo¶

$ git clone https://github.com/rabernat/xrft.git $ cd xrft $ python setup.py install .

Developers can track source code change:

$ git clone https://github.com/rabernat/xrft.git
$ cd xrft
$ python setup.py build .
